name: Memory Lane (itch) (Prinsessa)
description:
A short story about a lifetime. 🕖 Arrow keys or WASD to play.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47. The theme was stuck in a loop.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/memory-lane
